DOC.brief_summary: In this study, color (erythema) and pH will be measured on 3 consecutive days after application of 2 doses of SB204 to the cheeks of healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study Assessing Local Cutaneous Effects of SB204
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers Women who are pregnant or nursing Subject with known sensitivity to a component of the test materials
